projects.title: Personal Webpage
projects.description: The homepage you are on is one of my newer projects. It reflects the many things I learned during my month at the start-up HeyLama GmbH as a front-end developer.

projects.title: An ordering app
projects.description: My current project is an eCommerce website for a small-scale permacultural farm. So far, the logic for user handling, like registration and sign-in, is finished and realized with firebase.

projects.title: Numerical modelling
projects.description: For my master's in climate physics, I got the chance to develop a numerical model from scratch to simulate the upper equatorial oceanic currents. I'm very proud of it!
